name: Meta Miner
description: MINER - Dapp integration generating passive income through decentralized finance. Meta Miner will continue their mission to offer passive income and rewards to their holders. Through our successful utilities, such as staking, yield mining (farming), and NFTs. Our community will continue to help develop the next phase of Meta Miner. Meta Miner will be a lucrative asset in the Metaverse, allowing you to earn ETH in various ways. We will develop innovative infrastructure initiatives and solutions.
